MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Brewery Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:35 PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating unconfirmed reports of third party damage as the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:31PM on 30th October 2020.
